    Welcome

    I am expected to complete my M.Sc. in Economics at Uppsala University in August 2019.

    I will join the Monetary Policy Strategy Division of the European Central Bank for a one-year appointment starting from September 2019.

    I have previously worked as research assistant at the Center for Excellence in Finance and Economic Research (CEFER) of the Bank of Lithuania.

    My research interests are Macroeconometrics, Monetary Economics, International Finance, and Computational Macroeconomics.

    Contact Details

    Email: camilo.marchesini@gmail.com
